description: For Andrew Fitch, returning from military service is going to take some adjustment. Having been away, Andrew has developed some habits that are sort of peculiar to the life of a serviceman, but one thing he can count on is that his old buddy Sean Blue will be around to help ease the transition, and sure enough, as Andrew arrives on his doorstep, who should he find waiting there for him but Sean himself? title: Home Cumming
